txt.en: Completed Payment of an Ancient Debt
Ost Heryn is an ancient fortress built to support Fornost. In the time of need, however, its leader betrayed his oath.

'Ost Heryn is an ancient fortress made to watch the pass between the North Downs and Evendim. She was to answer the call of Fornost and support it if the need ever came. The need -- and the call -- did come, but support did not. Ost Heryn abandoned Fornost.

'For that, all who served within were cursed, branded as Oath-breakers, and left to stand their posts until they redeemed themselves. The time for redemption has come, and we are going to deliver it.

'I have devised a couple of plans for doing this. I do not know if any will succeed, but I believe they are all worth trying.'
Torogethir is at his camp in Parth Aduial.\n\nTorogethir has several tasks he wishes you to complete for him.

'It will take a few days for everything at Ost Heryn to settle down. When things of this power and nature are stirred, they do not immediately calm. I will watch the progress and report back if we were succesful.'
Torogethir is at his camp in Parth Aduial.\n\nTorogethir will want to speak to you about what happened at Ost Heryn.
Complete Payment of an Ancient Debt
Talk to Torogethir in Parth Aduial
